identified-content.object.title: Advertising (Times Column)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Marketing, Advertising and PR

block.p: Gannett Suburban Newspapers, White Plains, to Korey Kay & Partners, New York, as the first agency to handle television advertising. Billings were estimated at more than $1 million. * New Line Television, New York, part of the New Line Cinema unit of Time Warner Inc., to Spike DDB, New York, as the agency of record for a campaign for the Continental Basketball Association meant to develop a brand image and awareness for the league. Billings were not disclosed. Spike DDB is a joint venture of the director Spike Lee and the DDB Needham Worldwide unit of Omnicom Group. * Brown-Forman Beverages Worldwide, Louisville, Ky., to Simmons Durham, St. Louis, as the first agency to handle an integrated promotion campaign celebrating the birthday of Jack Daniel, after whom the company's Tennessee whisky is named. Billings for the campaign, to appear in European and Asian-Pacific markets, have not been determined.
